input.description:
The name of the virtual machine from which the virtual disks need to be removed.
Valid value: String

disk name: Name of the Virtual Disk to be removed.
You can also supply 'disk-key' instead of 'disk-name'. Either of 'disk-key' and 'disk-name' is mandatory. If both 'disk-name' and 'disk-key' are supplied, 'disk-key' will take priority and 'disk-name' will be ignored.
value: String

disk key: Unique key of the Virtual Disk to be removed. This can be obtained by calling the 'Retrieve VM Configuration' method on the VM.
You can also supply 'disk-name' instead of 'disk-key'. Either of 'disk-key' and 'disk-name' is mandatory. If both 'disk-name' and 'disk-key' are supplied, 'disk-key' will take priority and 'disk-name' will be ignored.
value: String

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-machine>${vm}</virtual-machine> <spec> <device-change-list> <device-change> <device type="VirtualDisk"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${disk key}')>0"> <disk-key>${disk key}</disk-key> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <disk-name>${disk name}</disk-name> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </device> </device-change> </device-change-list> </spec> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Constructs <items> for Remove Hard Disk operation
